meanings.definition: To make conform to a standard
meanings.sent1: The teacher standardizes the test format for all students.
meanings.sent2: The company standardizes its procedures to ensure consistency.
meanings.sent3: The robot standardizes its movements to dance perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership standardizes the team's approach to success.
meanings.sent5: The recipe standardizes the ingredients for the perfect cake.

meanings.definition: To establish or fix a standard for
meanings.sent1: The committee standardizes the safety regulations for the event.
meanings.sent2: The organization standardizes the quality requirements for suppliers.
meanings.sent3: The magician standardizes the tricks to always amaze the audience.
meanings.sent4: His voice standardizes the tone for the choir's performance.
meanings.sent5: The ruler standardizes the measurements for accuracy.

meanings.definition: To bring into conformity with a standard
meanings.sent1: The software standardizes the file formats for compatibility.
meanings.sent2: The school standardizes the dress code to promote unity.
meanings.sent3: The comedian standardizes his jokes to make everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The artist standardizes the colors to create a harmonious painting.
meanings.sent5: The coach standardizes the training routines for optimal performance.
